sources.title: Marry Me (1949)
sources.description: Marry Me!   is a 1949 British  comedy film  directed by  Terence Fisher , and starring  Derek Bond ,  Susan Shaw ,  Patrick Holt ,  Carol Marsh  and  David Tomlinson .

metadata.Plot: The stories of several individuals who consult a marriage bureau, including a peer of the realm, his butler, a lonely school teacher, a French girl on the run from a violent boyfriend, a country vicar and a newspaper reporter sent by his editor to do an undercover story.
metadata.Actors: Derek Bond, Susan Shaw, Patrick Holt
